name: Balloon Odyssey
description:
Travel as far as ou can and avoid the mines ! 

the game is about handle the weight of the objects to get your balloon lighter or heavier

use your mouse to drag and drop objects inside or outside the balloon. pick up the coins to increase your score!
And don't forget to share your highscores.

We are trying to get a webplayer version ASAP,  but there is still some export problems we can't solve at this time !

Game made by two persons in one week for the Brackeys Game jam 2018

Thibaut Baque & Johann Fabries 

Special thanks to the people who playtest the game for the feedback and to Maeva vigier for the advices and the title screen.
